name: NSRegularExpression.Options
desc: These constants define the regular expression options. These constants are used by the property options, regularExpressionWithPattern:options:error:, and init(pattern:options:).

items.name: static var caseInsensitive: NSRegularExpression.Options
items.desc: Match letters in the pattern independent of case.

items.name: static var allowCommentsAndWhitespace: NSRegularExpression.Options
items.desc: Ignore whitespace and #-prefixed comments in the pattern.

items.name: static var ignoreMetacharacters: NSRegularExpression.Options
items.desc: Treat the entire pattern as a literal string.

items.name: static var dotMatchesLineSeparators: NSRegularExpression.Options
items.desc: Allow . to match any character, including line separators.

items.name: static var anchorsMatchLines: NSRegularExpression.Options
items.desc: Allow ^ and $ to match the start and end of lines.

items.name: static var useUnixLineSeparators: NSRegularExpression.Options
items.desc: Treat only \n as a line separator (otherwise, all standard line separators are used).

items.name: static var useUnicodeWordBoundaries: NSRegularExpression.Options
items.desc: Use Unicode TR#29 to specify word boundaries (otherwise, traditional regular expression word boundaries are used).
